title: To Put Two Rovers On Mars, Scientists Had To Get Clever With Packing
teaser: To fit in their shipping container, two Mars rovers had to be folded up into a tiny package and then unfolded â€” a prime example of what NPR science correspondent Joe Palca calls "unfolding science."
